StringTable.Label: SpeciesTraits_RelativeExpectationsGroup_Dec
StringTable.String: Modifier on the [HS=HS_Expectations]Expectations[/HS] of each citizen of this species, on top of natural variation.

StringTable.Label: SpeciesTraits_RelativeIntelligenceGroup_Dec
StringTable.String: Modifier on the [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS] of each citizen of this species, on top of natural variation.

StringTable.Label: SpeciesTraits_RelativeResolveGroup_Dec
StringTable.String: Modifier on the [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS] of each citizen of this species, on top of natural variation.

StringTable.Label: SpeciesTraits_RelativeSocialGroup_Dec
StringTable.String: Modifier on the [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS] of each citizen of this species, on top of natural variation.

StringTable.Label: SpeciesTraits_RelativeDiligenceGroup_Dec
StringTable.String: Modifier on the [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS] of each citizen of this species, on top of natural variation.

StringTable.Label: SpeciesTraits_DefaultApprovalGroup_Dec
StringTable.String: The [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] that each citizen naturally starts with, which is then modified by other situational variables.

StringTable.Label: SpeciesTraits_DefaultFoodGroup_Dec
StringTable.String: The [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS] that each citizen needs to live and grow.

StringTable.Label: SpeciesTraits_DefaultGrowthGroup_Dec
StringTable.String: The [HS=HS_Growth]Growth Rate[/HS] that each citizen provides for the colony they reside in.

StringTable.Label: SpeciesApprovalMod_PollutionApprovalGroup_Dec
StringTable.String: The effect that a world's [HS=HS_Pollution]Pollution[/HS] level affects the [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] of a citizen of this species residing on that planet.
